special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
threat: If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted DVI file, an attacker could cause Evince to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking the program..
In the default installation, attackers would be isolated by the Evince AppArmor profile..
